author: cmantill
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces a tracking producer `SeedGeneratorFromTTracksEDProducer.cc` for hitless seeds from L1 tracks (currently taken from L1Trk emulation). 

These hitless seeds will be used in the HLT tracking sequence to produce TrackCandidates and online L1CtfTracks, which in turn will be part of the general tracks sequence. It should not affect any of the current workflows.

Performance and timing studies have been presented in the TRK POG and the HLT upgrade meeting:
- [TRK POG Jun 8](https://indico.cern.ch/event/923416/contributions/3879549/attachments/2052890/3441436/TRK_POG_L1_Jun2020.pdf)
- [HLT Upgrade Jun 23 (sl 10-11](https://indico.cern.ch/event/919645/contributions/3864402/attachments/2062303/3459873/HLT_Phase2_Tracking_Jun2020.pdf)

@AdrianoDee @mtosi 

A backport should be needed for CMSSW_11_1_X for HLT MC samples production.

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

The performance of the produced tracks has been validated in HLT sequences using TTbar PU=200 MC samples. 

HLT Configs that include this sequence can be found [here](https://github.com/AdrianoDee/CMS_HLT_Phase2_Tracking/blob/pre6_l1/wfs/tracking_sequences.py)
title: Add L1 hitless seeding for tracking @ HLT upgrade
